scripts.say: Come on. I thought you were a cutting-edge cruiser, but this is all you have?
Perhaps you weren't being as humble as I thought when you said you were rusty.
(We may have used exercise shells, but she didn't fight like this was an exercise! She held nothing back...!)
(She deserves to be reprimanded for going too... No, I need to calm down. They're our guests, after all.)
You fought wonderfully, Prinz Eugen. It is no wonder you have recieved so many medals.
I "fought wonderfully"? That was hardly a fight at all.
I could fight someone of your caliber in my sleep.
(This woman... You're really trying my patience now...!)
Is that so? Well, I am honored that you held nothing back on me, as this was merely an exercise battle.
God almighty, I can't believe we call you our allies. If they call you one of the Sakura Empire's most advanced cruisers, then we'd be better off without the help of your land of Neanderthals.
I'm utterly disappointed. Come on, Thiele. We're going home.
You're not going anywhere, Prinz Eugen!
If you so desperately want to see why I am a cutting-edge light cruiser, then I'll be more than glad to show you.
Insulting me is one thing, but I will not let your affront to the Sakura Empire go unpunished!
Ah, are you finally going to get serious? Good! I thought you never would!
Now, give me the fight I came here for!
